params.content:
1. Company Setups
  2. Edit

Edit Company Setup

Basic Company Settings

All employees will follow this payroll schedule
Minutes allowed before/after shift for attendance matching
Maximum hours in a shift before requiring approval
Require employees to follow assigned shift times
Allow administrators to manually edit time records

Device Management Settings

How often devices should check for configuration updates
How often devices should check for firmware updates
Allow individual devices to override company polling settings

Punch Processing Settings

Which engine(s) to use for punch type assignment
Minimum hours between punches for auto Clock In/Out assignment
Enable machine learning for punch classification
Automatically adjust punch types for incomplete records

System Settings

Level of system logging detail

Clock Event Processing Settings

How often to process ClockEvents into Attendance records
Number of clock events to process in each batch
Automatically retry events that failed processing

Vacation Configuration

Choose how employees accrue vacation time

Anniversary Settings

Employees must wait until their first anniversary to receive vacation
Award full year vacation on anniversary date
Global maximum vacation days (leave empty to use policy-based caps)
Allow partial vacation accrual in the first year of employment

General Vacation Settings

Allow employees to carry over unused vacation to the next period
Maximum vacation hours that can be carried over (leave empty for no limit)
Maximum vacation balance cap in hours (leave empty for no limit)
Prorate vacation accrual for employees hired mid-period
